const response = await client.indices.create({
  index: "5_char_words_example",
  settings: {
    analysis: {
      analyzer: {
        lowercase_5_char: {
          tokenizer: "lowercase",
          filter: ["5_char_trunc"],
        },
      },
      filter: {
        "5_char_trunc": {
          type: "truncate",
          length: 5,
        },
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
